speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: SCENE IV. Wales: before the cave of Belarius.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Enter BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, and ARVIRAGUS.

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: The noise is round about us.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Let us from it.

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: What pleasure, sir, find we in life, to lock it

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: From action and adventure?

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Nay, what hope

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Have we in hiding us? This way, the Romans

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Must or for Britons slay us, or receive us

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: For barbarous and unnatural revolts

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: During their use, and slay us after.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Sons,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: We'll higher to the mountains; there secure us.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: To the king's party there's no going: newness

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Of Cloten's death--we being not known, not muster'd

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Among the bands--may drive us to a render

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Where we have lived, and so extort from's that

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Which we have done, whose answer would be death

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Drawn on with torture.

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: This is, sir, a doubt

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: In such a time nothing becoming you,

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Nor satisfying us.

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: It is not likely

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: That when they hear the Roman horses neigh,

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: Behold their quarter'd fires, have both their eyes

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: And ears so cloy'd importantly as now,

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: That they will waste their time upon our note,

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: To know from whence we are.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: O, I am known

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Of many in the army: many years,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Though Cloten then but young, you see, not wore him

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: From my remembrance. And, besides, the king

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Hath not deserved my service nor your loves;

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Who find in my exile the want of breeding,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: The certainty of this hard life; aye hopeless

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: To have the courtesy your cradle promised,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: But to be still hot summer's tamings and

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: The shrinking slaves of winter.

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Than be so

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Better to cease to be. Pray, sir, to the army:

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: I and my brother are not known; yourself

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: So out of thought, and thereto so o'ergrown,

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: Cannot be question'd.

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: By this sun that shines,

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: I'll thither: what thing is it that I never

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: Did see man die! scarce ever look'd on blood,

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: But that of coward hares, hot goats, and venison!

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: Never bestrid a horse, save one that had

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: A rider like myself, who ne'er wore rowel

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: Nor iron on his heel! I am ashamed

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: To look upon the holy sun, to have

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: The benefit of his blest beams, remaining

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: So long a poor unknown.

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: By heavens, I'll go:

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: If you will bless me, sir, and give me leave,

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: I'll take the better care, but if you will not,

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: The hazard therefore due fall on me by

speaker: GUIDERIUS
text_entry: The hands of Romans!

speaker: ARVIRAGUS
text_entry: So say I amen.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: No reason I, since of your lives you set

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: So slight a valuation, should reserve

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: My crack'd one to more care. Have with you, boys!

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: If in your country wars you chance to die,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: That is my bed too, lads, an there I'll lie:

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Lead, lead.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Aside

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: The time seems long; their blood

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: thinks scorn,

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Till it fly out and show them princes born.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Exeunt
